Single Character Passwords Make Pure-Breeds (Chart)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance Archive (GameBoy Advance): Shrine Topics: Single Character Passwords Make Pure-Breeds (Chart)
By Lisa Shock on Thursday, March 21, 2002 - 11:42 am:

Just for reference, so no one has to duplicate this research, here is a chart of all monsters made with single-digit/letter passwords. They all make the main type, pure-breed monsters, so I have not listed the sub-breeds since they are all the same as the main type. Also note that each time a breed is generated, it has identical stats to others on the chart, these may be the baseline stats.

PasswordMonsterPowIntAccSpdDefLifChar
AMocchi100110140130130120Soft Body
BZuum13085135140100105Flex Tail
CGolem170806550150110Rock Skin
DDucken901208513512580Elec-proof
EMew11511013013085100Loud Voice
FDragon15515011585130120Heat Resis
GDragon15515011585130120Heat Resis
HArrowhead120105958017090Hard Shell
IPsiroller135709012080125Earth Know
JSuezo120150130959095Act. View
KOctopee11510513011570105Water Know
LTiger1201051501658095Elec Resis
MJoker12517015013090105Dark Aura
NMocchi100110140130130120Soft Body
QGolem170806550150110Rock Skin

QNaga160120150130115130Sharp Claw

TLesione120115110100105150Watr Resis

*Please note that this "x" is on the same line as +, -,/, and =. I did not have any way to type it as a different character than the lower-case x of the aplhabet.

Note that Zan does not appear at all on the list, and Durahan only appears once, as lucky number 7. All other breeds are represented.
